titleStmt.title: Some questions and answers shewing man his duty, and pointing him to the principle of God in his heart ... : As also, some questions and answers concerning the seed of Jacob, and the true church. / By Isaac Pennington.
titleStmt.author: Penington, Isaac, 1616-1679.

notesStmt.note: Errors in paging: numbering goes from p.6 to p.9.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
